articles.author: Eli Rosenberg
articles.title: JOLTS report: A record number of workers quit their jobs in September - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rising covid cases, problems finding child care, and better wages elsewhere have all prompted a record number of Americans to quit their jobs.
articles.content:
The statistics reflect the changes that continue to wrench the labor market after the pandemic upended the course of business and life across the country in 2020.

articles.title: US taking 'big bet' on Australia and nuclear submarines - 9News
articles.description: The sharing of sensitive American nuclear submarine technology with Australia is a signal that Washington is prepared to back its allies, a top US official says.
